contents.text:
Network Working Group                                            G. Zorn
Request for Comments: 2548                         Microsoft Corporation
Category: Informational                                       March 1999
Microsoft Vendor-specific RADIUS Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: Microsoft特定于供应商的RADIUS属性

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Copyright (C) The Internet Society (1999). All Rights Reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）互联网协会（1999年）。版权所有。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document describes the set of Microsoft vendor-specific RADIUS attributes. These attributes are designed to support Microsoft proprietary dial-up protocols and/or provide support for features which is not provided by the standard RADIUS attribute set [3]. It is expected that this memo will be updated whenever Microsoft defines a new vendor-specific attribute, since its primary purpose is to provide an open, easily accessible reference for third-parties wishing to interoperate with Microsoft products.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档介绍Microsoft供应商特定的RADIUS属性集。这些属性旨在支持Microsoft专有拨号协议和/或支持标准RADIUS属性集[3]未提供的功能。由于此备忘录的主要目的是为希望与Microsoft产品进行交互的第三方提供一个开放的、易于访问的参考，因此，每当Microsoft定义新的特定于供应商的属性时，都会更新此备忘录。

contents.text: 1. Specification of Requirements
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 需求说明

contents.text: In this document, the key words "MAY", "MUST, "MUST NOT", "optional", "recommended", "SHOULD", and "SHOULD NOT" are to be interpreted as described in [2].
contents.zh-CHS: 在本文件中，关键词“可能”、“必须”、“不得”、“可选”、“建议”、“应该”和“不应该”的解释如[2]所述。

contents.text: 2. Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 属性

contents.text: The following sections describe sub-attributes which may be transmitted in one or more RADIUS attributes of type Vendor-Specific [3]. More than one sub-attribute MAY be transmitted in a single Vendor-Specific Attribute; if this is done, the sub-attributes SHOULD be packed as a sequence of Vendor-Type/Vendor-Length/Value triples following the inital Type, Length and Vendor-ID fields. The Length field of the Vendor-Specific Attribute MUST be set equal to the sum of the Vendor-Length fields of the sub-attributes contained in the Vendor-Specific Attribute, plus six. The Vendor-ID field of the Vendor-Specific Attribute(s) MUST be set to decimal 311 (Microsoft).
contents.zh-CHS: 以下章节描述了可在一个或多个特定于供应商[3]类型的RADIUS属性中传输的子属性。可以在单个供应商特定属性中传输多个子属性；如果完成此操作，子属性应打包为初始类型、长度和供应商ID字段后面的供应商类型/供应商长度/值三元组序列。供应商特定属性的长度字段必须设置为供应商特定属性中包含的子属性的供应商长度字段之和加上六。供应商特定属性的供应商ID字段必须设置为十进制311（Microsoft）。

contents.text: 2.1. Attributes for Support of MS-CHAP Version 1
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. 支持MS-CHAP版本1的属性

contents.text: 2.1.1. Introduction

Microsoft created Microsoft Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (MS-CHAP) [4] to authenticate remote Windows workstations, providing the functionality to which LAN-based users are accustomed. Where possible, MS-CHAP is consistent with standard CHAP [5], and the differences are easily modularized. Briefly, the differences between MS-CHAP and standard CHAP are:
contents.zh-CHS: Microsoft创建了Microsoft Challenge Handshake身份验证协议（MS-CHAP）[4]来验证远程Windows工作站，提供了基于LAN的用户习惯的功能。在可能的情况下，MS-CHAP与标准CHAP[5]保持一致，并且这些差异易于模块化。简而言之，MS-CHAP和标准CHAP之间的区别是：

contents.text: * MS-CHAP is enabled by negotiating CHAP Algorithm 0x80 in LCP option 3, Authentication Protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: * MS-CHAP通过协商LCP选项3“身份验证协议”中的CHAP算法0x80启用。

contents.text: * The MS-CHAP Response packet is in a format designed for compatibility with Microsoft Windows NT 3.5, 3.51 and 4.0, Microsoft Windows95, and Microsoft LAN Manager 2.x networking products. The MS-CHAP format does not require the authenticator to store a clear-text or reversibly encrypted password.
contents.zh-CHS: * MS-CHAP响应数据包的格式旨在与Microsoft Windows NT 3.5、3.51和4.0、Microsoft Windows 95和Microsoft LAN Manager 2.x网络产品兼容。MS-CHAP格式不要求验证器存储明文或可逆加密密码。

contents.text: * MS-CHAP provides an authenticator-controlled authentication retry mechanism.
contents.zh-CHS: * MS-CHAP提供了验证器控制的身份验证重试机制。

contents.text: * MS-CHAP provides an authenticator-controlled password changing mechanism.
contents.zh-CHS: * MS-CHAP提供了由身份验证程序控制的密码更改机制。

contents.text: * MS-CHAP defines an extended set of reason-for-failure codes, returned in the Failure packet Message field.
contents.zh-CHS: * MS-CHAP定义了一组扩展的故障原因代码，在故障包消息字段中返回。

contents.text: The attributes defined in this section reflect these differences.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中定义的属性反映了这些差异。

contents.text: 2.1.2. MS-CHAP-Challenge
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.2. 查普女士挑战赛

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute contains the challenge sent by a NAS to a Microsoft Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (MS-CHAP) user. It MAY be used in both Access-Request and Access-Challenge packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性包含NAS发送给Microsoft质询握手身份验证协议（MS-CHAP）用户的质询。它可以用于访问请求和访问质询数据包。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-Challenge Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP质询属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 11 for MS-CHAP-Challenge.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP挑战的供应商类型11。

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 2
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>2

contents.text: String The String field contains the MS-CHAP challenge.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串字符串字段包含MS-CHAP质询。

contents.text: 2.1.3. MS-CHAP-Response
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.3. MS CHAP响应

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute contains the response value provided by a PPP Microsoft Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (MS-CHAP) user in response to the challenge. It is only used in Access-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性包含PPP Microsoft质询握手身份验证协议（MS-CHAP）用户响应质询时提供的响应值。它仅用于访问请求数据包。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-Response Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP响应属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 1 for MS-CHAP-Response.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP响应的供应商类型1。

contents.text: Vendor-Length 52
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度52

contents.text: Ident Identical to the PPP CHAP Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识与PPP CHAP标识相同。

contents.text: Flags The Flags field is one octet in length. If the Flags field is one (0x01), the NT-Response field is to be used in preference to the LM-Response field for authentication. The LM-Response field MAY still be used (if non-empty), but the NT-Response SHOULD be tried first. If it is zero, the NT-Response field MUST be ignored and the LM-Response field used.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志标志字段的长度为一个八位字节。如果标志字段为1（0x01），则NT响应字段将优先于LM响应字段用于身份验证。LM响应字段仍可使用（如果非空），但应首先尝试NT响应。如果为零，则必须忽略NT响应字段，并使用LM响应字段。

contents.text: LM-Response The LM-Response field is 24 octets in length and holds an encoded function of the password and the received challenge. If this field is empty, it SHOULD be zero-filled.
contents.zh-CHS: LM Response LM Response字段的长度为24个八位字节，包含密码和接收的质询的编码函数。如果此字段为空，则应为零填充。

contents.text: NT-Response
contents.zh-CHS: NT响应

contents.text: The NT-Response field is 24 octets in length and holds an encoded function of the password and the received challenge. If this field is empty, it SHOULD be zero-filled.
contents.zh-CHS: NT响应字段的长度为24个八位字节，包含密码和接收的质询的编码函数。如果此字段为空，则应为零填充。

contents.text: 2.1.4. MS-CHAP-Domain
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.4. MS CHAP域

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-CHAP-Domain Attribute indicates the Windows NT domain in which the user was authenticated. It MAY be included in both Access-Accept and Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP Domain属性表示用户在其中进行身份验证的Windows NT域。它可以包含在访问接受和记帐请求数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-Domain Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP域属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 10 for MS-CHAP-Domain.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP域的供应商类型10。

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 3
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>3

contents.text: Ident The Ident field is one octet and aids in matching requests and replies.
contents.zh-CHS: Ident Ident字段是一个八位字节，有助于匹配请求和答复。

contents.text: String This field contains the name in ASCII of the Windows NT domain in which the user was authenticated.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串此字段包含用户在其中进行身份验证的Windows NT域的ASCII名称。

contents.text: 2.1.5. MS-CHAP-Error
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.5. MS CHAP错误

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-CHAP-Error Attribute contains error data related to the preceding MS-CHAP exchange. This Attribute may be used in both MS-CHAP-V1 and MS-CHAP-V2 (see below) exchanges. It is only used in Access-Reject packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP Error属性包含与前面的MS-CHAP交换相关的错误数据。此属性可在MS-CHAP-V1和MS-CHAP-V2（见下文）交换中使用。它仅用于访问拒绝数据包。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-Error Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP错误属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 2 for MS-CHAP-Error.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP错误的供应商类型2。

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 3
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>3

contents.text: Ident The Ident field is one octet and aids in matching requests and replies.
contents.zh-CHS: Ident Ident字段是一个八位字节，有助于匹配请求和答复。

contents.text: String This field contains specially formatted ASCII text, which is interpreted by the authenticating peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串此字段包含特殊格式的ASCII文本，由身份验证对等方进行解释。

contents.text: 2.1.6. MS-CHAP-CPW-1
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.6. MS-CHAP-CPW-1

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute allows the user to change their password if it has expired. This Attribute is only used in Access-Request packets, and should only be included if an MS-CHAP-Error attribute was included in the immediately preceding Access-Reject packet, the String field of the MS-CHAP-Error attribute indicated that the user password had expired, and the MS-CHAP version is less than 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性允许用户在密码过期时更改密码。此属性仅在访问请求数据包中使用，并且仅当前一个访问拒绝数据包中包含MS CHAP错误属性、MS CHAP错误属性的字符串字段指示用户密码已过期且MS-CHAP版本小于2时，才应包含此属性。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-CPW-1 Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP-CPW-1属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 3 for MS-CHAP-PW-1
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP-PW-1的供应商类型3

contents.text: Vendor-Length 72
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度72

contents.text: Code The Code field is one octet in length. Its value is always 5.
contents.zh-CHS: 代码代码字段的长度为一个八位字节。其值始终为5。

contents.text: Ident The Ident field is one octet and aids in matching requests and replies.
contents.zh-CHS: Ident Ident字段是一个八位字节，有助于匹配请求和答复。

contents.text: LM-Old-Password The LM-Old-Password field is 16 octets in length. It contains the encrypted Lan Manager hash of the old password.
contents.zh-CHS: LM旧密码LM旧密码字段的长度为16个八位字节。它包含旧密码的加密Lan Manager哈希。

contents.text: LM-New-Password The LM-New-Password field is 16 octets in length. It contains the encrypted Lan Manager hash of the new password.
contents.zh-CHS: LM New Password LM New Password字段的长度为16个八位字节。它包含新密码的加密Lan Manager哈希。

contents.text: NT-Old-Password The NT-Old-Password field is 16 octets in length. It contains the encrypted Lan Manager hash of the old password.
contents.zh-CHS: NT旧密码NT旧密码字段的长度为16个八位字节。它包含旧密码的加密Lan Manager哈希。

contents.text: NT-New-Password The NT-New-Password field is 16 octets in length. It contains the encrypted Lan Manager hash of the new password.
contents.zh-CHS: NT新密码NT新密码字段的长度为16个八位字节。它包含新密码的加密Lan Manager哈希。

contents.text: New-LM-Password-Length The New-LM-Password-Length field is two octets in length and contains the length in octets of the new LAN Manager-compatible password.
contents.zh-CHS: 新LM密码长度新LM密码长度字段的长度为两个八位字节，包含新LAN Manager兼容密码的长度（八位字节）。

contents.text: Flags The Flags field is two octets in length. If the least significant bit of the Flags field is one, this indicates that the NT-New-Password and NT-Old-Password fields are valid and SHOULD be used. Otherwise, the LM-New-Password and LM-Old-Password fields MUST be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志标志字段的长度为两个八位字节。如果标志字段的最低有效位为1，则表示NT New Password和NT Old Password字段有效且应使用。否则，必须使用LM新密码和LM旧密码字段。

contents.text: 2.1.7. MS-CHAP-CPW-2
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.7. MS-CHAP-CPW-2

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute allows the user to change their password if it has expired. This Attribute is only used in Access-Request packets, and should only be included if an MS-CHAP-Error attribute was included in the immediately preceding Access-Reject packet, the String field of the MS-CHAP-Error attribute indicated that the user password had expired, and the MS-CHAP version is equal to 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性允许用户在密码过期时更改密码。此属性仅在访问请求数据包中使用，并且仅当前一个访问拒绝数据包中包含MS CHAP错误属性、MS CHAP错误属性的字符串字段指示用户密码已过期且MS-CHAP版本等于2时，才应包含此属性。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-CPW-2 Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP-CPW-2属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 4 for MS-CHAP-PW-2
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP-PW-2的供应商类型4

contents.text: Vendor-Length 86
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度86

contents.text: Code 6
contents.zh-CHS: 代码6

contents.text: Ident The Ident field is one octet and aids in matching requests and replies. The value of this field MUST be identical to that in the Ident field in all instances of the MS-CHAP-LM-Enc-PW, MS-CHAP-NT-Enc-PW and MS-CHAP-PW-2 attributes contained in a single Access-Request packet.
contents.zh-CHS: Ident Ident字段是一个八位字节，有助于匹配请求和答复。此字段的值必须与单个访问请求数据包中包含的MS CHAP LM Enc PW、MS CHAP NT Enc PW和MS-CHAP-PW-2属性的所有实例中的标识字段中的值相同。

contents.text: Old-NT-Hash The Old-NT-Hash field is 16 octets in length. It contains the old Windows NT password hash encrypted with the new Windows NT password hash.
contents.zh-CHS: 旧NT哈希旧NT哈希字段的长度为16个八位字节。它包含用新Windows NT密码哈希加密的旧Windows NT密码哈希。

contents.text: Old-LM-Hash The Old-LM-Hash field is 16 octets in length. It contains the old Lan Manager password hash encrypted with the new Windows NT password hash.
contents.zh-CHS: 旧LM哈希旧LM哈希字段的长度为16个八位字节。它包含用新的Windows NT密码哈希加密的旧Lan Manager密码哈希。

contents.text: LM-Response The LM-Response field is 24 octets in length and holds an encoded function of the password and the received challenge. If this field is empty, it SHOULD be zero-filled.
contents.zh-CHS: LM Response LM Response字段的长度为24个八位字节，包含密码和接收的质询的编码函数。如果此字段为空，则应为零填充。

contents.text: NT-Response The NT-Response field is 24 octets in length and holds an encoded function of the password and the received challenge. If this field is empty, it SHOULD be zero-filled.
contents.zh-CHS: NT响应NT响应字段的长度为24个八位字节，包含密码和接收的质询的编码函数。如果此字段为空，则应为零填充。

contents.text: Flags The Flags field is two octets in length. If the least significant bit (bit 0) of this field is one, the NT-Response field is to be used in preference to the LM-Response field for authentication. The LM-Response field MAY still be used (if present), but the NT-Response SHOULD be tried first. If least significant bit of the field is zero, the NT-Response field MUST be ignored and the LM-Response field used instead. If bit 1 of the Flags field is one, the Old-LM-Hash field is valid and SHOULD be used. If this bit is set, at least one instance of the MS-CHAP-LM-Enc-PW attribute MUST be included in the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志标志字段的长度为两个八位字节。如果此字段的最低有效位（位0）为1，则要优先使用NT响应字段而不是LM响应字段进行身份验证。仍然可以使用LM响应字段（如果存在），但应首先尝试NT响应。如果字段的最低有效位为零，则必须忽略NT响应字段，而使用LM响应字段。如果标志字段的第1位为1，则旧的LM哈希字段有效，应使用。如果设置了此位，则数据包中必须至少包含一个MS CHAP LM Enc PW属性实例。

contents.text: 2.1.8. MS-CHAP-LM-Enc-PW
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.8. MS CHAP LM Enc PW

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute contains the new Windows NT password encrypted with the old LAN Manager password hash. The encrypted Windows NT password is 516 octets in length; since this is longer than the maximum lengtth of a RADIUS attribute, the password must be split into several attibutes for transmission. A 2 octet sequence number is included in the attribute to help preserve ordering of the password fragments.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性包含使用旧LAN Manager密码哈希加密的新Windows NT密码。加密的Windows NT密码长度为516个八位字节；由于该长度大于RADIUS属性的最大长度，因此必须将密码拆分为多个属性进行传输。属性中包含2个八位字节的序列号，以帮助保留密码片段的顺序。

contents.text: This Attribute is only used in Access-Request packets, in conjunction with the MS-CHAP-CPW-2 attribute. It should only be included if an MS-CHAP-Error attribute was included in the immediately preceding Access-Reject packet, the String field of the MS-CHAP-Error attribute indicated that the user password had expired, and the MS-CHAP version is 2 or greater.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性仅与MS-CHAP-CPW-2属性一起用于访问请求数据包。仅当MS CHAP错误属性包含在前一个访问拒绝数据包中，MS CHAP错误属性的字符串字段指示用户密码已过期，并且MS-CHAP版本为2或更高时，才应包含该属性。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-LM-Enc-PW Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP LM Enc PW属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 5 for MS-CHAP-LM-Enc-PW
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP LM Enc PW的供应商类型5

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>6

contents.text: Code 6. Code is the same as for the MS-CHAP-PW-2 attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 代码6。代码与MS-CHAP-PW-2属性的代码相同。

contents.text: Ident The Ident field is one octet and aids in matching requests and replies. The value of this field MUST be identical in all instances of the MS-CHAP-LM-Enc-PW, MS-CHAP-NT-Enc-PW and MS-CHAP-PW-2 attributes which are present in the same Access-Request packet.
contents.zh-CHS: Ident Ident字段是一个八位字节，有助于匹配请求和答复。在同一访问请求数据包中存在的MS CHAP LM Enc PW、MS CHAP NT Enc PW和MS-CHAP-PW-2属性的所有实例中，此字段的值必须相同。

contents.text: Sequence-Number The Sequence-Number field is two octets in length and indicates which "chunk" of the encrypted password is contained in the following String field.
contents.zh-CHS: 序列号序列号字段的长度为两个八位字节，并指示以下字符串字段中包含加密密码的哪个“块”。

contents.text: String The String field contains a portion of the encrypted password.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串字符串字段包含加密密码的一部分。

contents.text: 2.2. MS-CHAP-NT-Enc-PW
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. 新界沙田女士

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute contains the new Windows NT password encrypted with the old Windows NT password hash. The encrypted Windows NT password is 516 octets in length; since this is longer than the maximum lengtth of a RADIUS attribute, the password must be split into several attibutes for transmission. A 2 octet sequence number is included in the attribute to help preserve ordering of the password fragments.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性包含使用旧Windows NT密码哈希加密的新Windows NT密码。加密的Windows NT密码长度为516个八位字节；由于该长度大于RADIUS属性的最大长度，因此必须将密码拆分为多个属性进行传输。属性中包含2个八位字节的序列号，以帮助保留密码片段的顺序。

contents.text: This Attribute is only used in Access-Request packets, in conjunc-tion with the MS-CHAP-CPW-2 and MS-CHAP2-CPW attributes. It should only be included if an MS-CHAP-Error attribute was included in the immediately preceding Access-Reject packet, the String field of the MS-CHAP-Error attribute indicated that the user password had expired, and the MS-CHAP version is 2 or greater.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性仅与MS-CHAP-CPW-2和MS-CHAP2-CPW属性一起用于访问请求数据包。仅当MS CHAP错误属性包含在前一个访问拒绝数据包中，MS CHAP错误属性的字符串字段指示用户密码已过期，并且MS-CHAP版本为2或更高时，才应包含该属性。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-NT-Enc-PW Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP NT Enc PW属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 6 for MS-CHAP-NT-Enc-PW
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP NT Enc PW的供应商类型6

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>6

contents.text: Code 6. Code is the same as for the MS-CHAP-PW-2 attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 代码6。代码与MS-CHAP-PW-2属性的代码相同。

contents.text: Ident The Ident field is one octet and aids in matching requests and replies. The value of this field MUST be identical in all instances of the MS-CHAP-LM-Enc-PW, MS-CHAP-NT-Enc-PW and MS-CHAP-PW-2 attributes which are present in the same Access-Request packet.
contents.zh-CHS: Ident Ident字段是一个八位字节，有助于匹配请求和答复。在同一访问请求数据包中存在的MS CHAP LM Enc PW、MS CHAP NT Enc PW和MS-CHAP-PW-2属性的所有实例中，此字段的值必须相同。

contents.text: Sequence-Number The Sequence-Number field is two octets in length and indicates which "chunk" of the encrypted password is contained in the following String field.
contents.zh-CHS: 序列号序列号字段的长度为两个八位字节，并指示以下字符串字段中包含加密密码的哪个“块”。

contents.text: String The String field contains a portion of the encrypted password.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串字符串字段包含加密密码的一部分。

contents.text: 2.3. Attributes for Support of MS-CHAP Version 2
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. 支持MS-CHAP版本2的属性

contents.text: 2.3.1. Introduction

This section describes RADIUS attributes supporting version two of Microsoft's PPP CHAP dialect (MS-CHAP-V2) [14]. MS-CHAP-V2 is similar to, but incompatible with, MS-CHAP version one (MS-CHAP-V1) [4]. Certain protocol fields have been deleted or reused but with different semantics. Where possible, MS-CHAP-V2 is consistent with both MS-CHAP-V1 and standard CHAP [1]. Briefly, the differences between MS-CHAP-V2 and MS-CHAP-V1 are:
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍支持Microsoft PPP CHAP方言（MS-CHAP-V2）第二版的RADIUS属性[14]。MS-CHAP-V2与MS-CHAP版本一（MS-CHAP-V1）相似，但不兼容[4]。某些协议字段已被删除或重用，但语义不同。在可能的情况下，MS-CHAP-V2与MS-CHAP-V1和标准CHAP[1]一致。简而言之，MS-CHAP-V2和MS-CHAP-V1之间的区别是：

contents.text: * MS-CHAP-V2 is enabled by negotiating CHAP Algorithm 0x81 in LCP option 3, Authentication Protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: * MS-CHAP-V2通过协商LCP选项3“身份验证协议”中的CHAP算法0x81启用。

contents.text: * MS-CHAP-V2 provides mutual authentication between peers by piggybacking a peer challenge on the Response packet and an authenticator response on the Success packet.
contents.zh-CHS: * MS-CHAP-V2通过在响应数据包上搭载对等质询和在成功数据包上搭载验证器响应，在对等方之间提供相互认证。

contents.text: * The calculation of the "Windows NT compatible challenge response" sub-field in the Response packet has been changed to include the peer challenge and the user name.
contents.zh-CHS: * 响应数据包中“Windows NT compatible challenge response”子字段的计算已更改为包括对等质询和用户名。

contents.text: * In MS-CHAP-V1, the "LAN Manager compatible challenge response" sub-field was always sent in the Response packet. This field has been replaced in MS-CHAP-V2 by the Peer-Challenge field.
contents.zh-CHS: * 在MS-CHAP-V1中，“LAN Manager兼容质询响应”子字段始终在响应数据包中发送。在MS-CHAP-V2中，此字段已被对等质询字段替换。

contents.text: * The format of the Message field in the Failure packet has been changed.
contents.zh-CHS: * 故障数据包中消息字段的格式已更改。

contents.text: * The Change Password (version 1) and Change Password (version 2) packets are no longer supported. They have been replaced with a single Change-Password packet.
contents.zh-CHS: * 不再支持更改密码（版本1）和更改密码（版本2）数据包。它们已被替换为单个更改密码包。

contents.text: The attributes defined in this section reflect these differences.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中定义的属性反映了这些差异。

contents.text: 2.3.2. MS-CHAP2-Response
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3.2. MS-CHAP2反应

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute contains the response value provided by an MS-CHAP-V2 peer in response to the challenge. It is only used in Access-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性包含MS-CHAP-V2对等方响应质询时提供的响应值。它仅用于访问请求数据包。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP2-Response Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP2-Response属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 25 for MS-CHAP2-Response.
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP2-响应的供应商类型25。

contents.text: Vendor-Length 52
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度52

contents.text: Ident Identical to the PPP MS-CHAP v2 Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识与PPP MS-CHAP v2标识相同。

contents.text: Flags The Flags field is one octet in length. It is reserved for future use and MUST be zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志标志字段的长度为一个八位字节。它是为将来使用而保留的，并且必须为零。

contents.text: Peer-Challenge The Peer-Challenge field is a 16-octet random number.
contents.zh-CHS: 对等质询对等质询字段是一个16个八位组的随机数。

contents.text: Reserved This field is reserved for future use and MUST be zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留此字段保留供将来使用，必须为零。

contents.text: Response The Response field is 24 octets in length and holds an encoded function of the password, the Peer-Challenge field and the received challenge.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应响应字段长度为24个八位字节，包含密码、对等质询字段和接收质询的编码函数。

contents.text: 2.3.3. MS-CHAP2-Success
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3.3. MS-CHAP2-Success

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute contains a 42-octet authenticator response string. This string MUST be included in the Message field of the MS-CHAP-V2 Success packet sent from the NAS to the peer. This Attribute is only used in Access-Accept packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性包含42个八位字节的验证器响应字符串。此字符串必须包含在从NAS发送到对等方的MS-CHAP-V2成功数据包的消息字段中。此属性仅在Access Accept数据包中使用。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP2-Success Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP2-Success属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 26 for MS-CHAP2-Success.
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP2-Success的供应商类型26。

contents.text: Vendor-Length 45
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度45

contents.text: Ident Identical to the PPP MS-CHAP v2 Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识与PPP MS-CHAP v2标识相同。

contents.text: String The 42-octet authenticator string (see above).
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串42个八位字节的验证器字符串（见上文）。

contents.text: 2.3.4. MS-CHAP2-CPW
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3.4. MS-CHAP2-CPW

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute allows the user to change their password if it has expired. This Attribute is only used in conjunction with the MS-CHAP-NT-Enc-PW attribute in Access-Request packets, and should only be included if an MS-CHAP-Error attribute was included in the immediately preceding Access-Reject packet, the String field of the MS-CHAP-Error attribute indicated that the user password had expired, and the MS-CHAP version is equal to 3.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性允许用户在密码过期时更改密码。此属性仅与访问请求数据包中的MS CHAP NT Enc PW属性一起使用，并且仅当MS CHAP错误属性包含在前一个访问拒绝数据包中时，才应包含此属性，MS CHAP错误属性的字符串字段指示用户密码已过期，MS-CHAP版本等于3。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-CPW-2 Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP-CPW-2属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 27 for MS-CHAP2-PW
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP2-PW的供应商类型27

contents.text: Vendor-Length 70
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度70

contents.text: Code 7
contents.zh-CHS: 代码7

contents.text: Ident The Ident field is one octet and aids in matching requests and replies. The value of this field MUST be identical to that in the Ident field in all instances of the MS-CHAP-NT-Enc-PW contained in the Access-Request packet.
contents.zh-CHS: Ident Ident字段是一个八位字节，有助于匹配请求和答复。此字段的值必须与访问请求数据包中包含的MS CHAP NT Enc PW的所有实例中的Ident字段中的值相同。

contents.text: Encrypted-Hash The Encrypted-Hash field is 16 octets in length. It contains the old Windows NT password hash encrypted with the new Windows NT password hash.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密哈希加密哈希字段的长度为16个八位字节。它包含用新Windows NT密码哈希加密的旧Windows NT密码哈希。

contents.text: NT-Response The NT-Response field is 24 octets in length and holds an encoded function of the new password, the Peer-Challenge field and the received challenge.
contents.zh-CHS: NT响应NT响应字段长度为24个八位字节，包含新密码、对等质询字段和接收质询的编码函数。

contents.text: Flags The Flags field is two octets in length. This field is reserved for future use and MUST be zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志标志字段的长度为两个八位字节。此字段保留供将来使用，必须为零。

contents.text: 2.4. Attributes for MPPE Support
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4. MPPE支持的属性

contents.text: This section describes a set of Attributes designed to support the use of Microsoft Point-to-Point Encryption (MPPE) [6] in dial-up networks. MPPE is a means of representing Point to Point Protocol (PPP) [7] packets in a encrypted form. MPPE uses the RSA RC4 [8] algorithm for encryption. The length of the session key to be used for initializing encryption tables can be negotiated; MPPE currently supports 40 bit and 128 bit session keys. MPPE is negotiated within option 18 in the PPP Compression Control Protocol (CCP)[9], [10].
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍一组属性，这些属性旨在支持在拨号网络中使用Microsoft点对点加密（MPPE）[6]。MPPE是一种以加密形式表示点对点协议（PPP）[7]数据包的方法。MPPE使用RSA RC4[8]算法进行加密。用于初始化加密表的会话密钥的长度可以协商；MPPE目前支持40位和128位会话密钥。MPPE在PPP压缩控制协议（CCP）[9]，[10]中的选项18内协商。

contents.text: 2.4.1. MS-CHAP-MPPE-Keys
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4.1. MS CHAP MPPE密钥

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-CHAP-MPPE-Keys Attribute contains two session keys for use by the Microsoft Point-to-Point Encryption Protocol (MPPE). This Attribute is only included in Access-Accept packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP MPPE Keys属性包含两个会话密钥，供Microsoft点对点加密协议（MPPE）使用。此属性仅包含在Access Accept数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-CHAP-MPPE-Keys Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP MPPE密钥属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 12 for MS-CHAP-MPPE-Keys.
contents.zh-CHS: MS CHAP MPPE密钥的供应商类型12。

contents.text: Vendor-Length 34
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度34

contents.text: Keys The Keys field consists of two logical sub-fields: the LM-Key and the NT-Key. The LM-Key is eight octets in length and contains the first eight bytes of the output of the function LmPasswordHash(P, This hash is constructed as follows: let the plain-text password be represented by P.
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥密钥字段由两个逻辑子字段组成：LM密钥和NT密钥。LM密钥的长度为八个八位字节，包含函数LmPasswordHash（P）输出的前八个字节，此哈希的构造如下：让明文密码由P表示。

contents.text: The NT-Key sub-field is sixteen octets in length and contains the first sixteen octets of the hashed Windows NT password. The format of the plaintext Keys field is illustrated in the following diagram:
contents.zh-CHS: NT Key子字段的长度为十六个八位字节，包含哈希Windows NT密码的前十六个八位字节。明文密钥字段的格式如下图所示：

contents.text: The Keys field MUST be encrypted by the RADIUS server using the same method defined for the User-Password Attribute [3]. Padding is required because the method referenced above requires the field to be encrypted to be a multiple of sixteen octets in length.
contents.zh-CHS: RADIUS服务器必须使用为用户密码属性[3]定义的相同方法对密钥字段进行加密。需要填充，因为上面引用的方法要求将字段加密为16个八位字节的倍数。

contents.text: Implementation Note This attribute should only be returned in response to an Access-Request packet containing MS-CHAP attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明：此属性仅应在响应包含MS-CHAP属性的访问请求数据包时返回。

contents.text: 2.4.2. MS-MPPE-Send-Key
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4.2. MS MPPE发送密钥

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-MPPE-Send-Key Attribute contains a session key for use by the Microsoft Point-to-Point Encryption Protocol (MPPE). As the name implies, this key is intended for encrypting packets sent from the NAS to the remote host. This Attribute is only included in Access-Accept packets.
contents.zh-CHS: “MS MPPE发送密钥”属性包含Microsoft点对点加密协议（MPPE）使用的会话密钥。顾名思义，此密钥用于加密从NAS发送到远程主机的数据包。此属性仅包含在Access Accept数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-MPPE-Send-Key Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE发送密钥属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 16 for MS-MPPE-Send-Key.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE发送密钥的供应商类型16。

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 4
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>4

contents.text: Salt The Salt field is two octets in length and is used to ensure the uniqueness of the keys used to encrypt each of the encrypted attributes occurring in a given Access-Accept packet. The most significant bit (leftmost) of the Salt field MUST be set (1). The contents of each Salt field in a given Access-Accept packet MUST be unique.
contents.zh-CHS: Salt Salt字段的长度为两个八位字节，用于确保用于加密给定访问接受数据包中每个加密属性的密钥的唯一性。必须设置盐场的最高有效位（最左侧）（1）。给定访问接受数据包中每个盐域的内容必须是唯一的。

contents.text: String The plaintext String field consists of three logical sub-fields: the Key-Length and Key sub-fields (both of which are required), and the optional Padding sub-field. The Key-Length sub-field is one octet in length and contains the length of the unencrypted Key sub-field. The Key sub-field contains the actual encryption key. If the combined length (in octets) of the unencrypted Key-Length and Key sub-fields is not an even multiple of 16, then the Padding sub-field MUST be present. If it is present, the length of the Padding sub-field is variable, between 1 and 15 octets. The String field MUST be encrypted as follows, prior to transmission:
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串纯文本字符串字段由三个逻辑子字段组成：键长度和键子字段（两者都是必需的），以及可选的填充子字段。密钥长度子字段的长度为一个八位字节，包含未加密密钥子字段的长度。密钥子字段包含实际的加密密钥。如果未加密密钥长度和密钥子字段的组合长度（以八位字节为单位）不是16的偶数倍，则必须存在填充子字段。如果存在，则填充子字段的长度是可变的，介于1到15个八位字节之间。在传输之前，必须按照以下方式对字符串字段进行加密：

contents.text: Construct a plaintext version of the String field by concate-nating the Key-Length and Key sub-fields. If necessary, pad the resulting string until its length (in octets) is an even multiple of 16. It is recommended that zero octets (0x00) be used for padding. Call this plaintext P.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过连接键长度和键子字段，构造字符串字段的纯文本版本。如有必要，填充生成的字符串，直到其长度（以八位字节为单位）为16的偶数倍。建议将零个八位字节（0x00）用于填充。把这称为明文P。

contents.text: Call the shared secret S, the pseudo-random 128-bit Request Authenticator (from the corresponding Access-Request packet) R, and the contents of the Salt field A. Break P into 16 octet chunks p(1), p(2)...p(i), where i = len(P)/16. Call the ciphertext blocks c(1), c(2)...c(i) and the final ciphertext C. Intermediate values b(1), b(2)...c(i) are required. Encryption is performed in the following manner ('+' indicates concatenation):
contents.zh-CHS: 调用共享秘密S、伪随机128位请求验证器（来自相应的访问请求分组）R和盐域A的内容。将P分成16个八位组块P（1），P（2）…P（i），其中i＝len（P）/16。调用密文块c（1）、c（2）…c（i）和最终密文c。需要中间值b（1）、b（2）…c（i）。加密以以下方式执行（“+”表示串联）：

contents.text: The resulting encrypted String field will contain c(1)+c(2)+...+c(i).
contents.zh-CHS: 生成的加密字符串字段将包含c（1）+c（2）+…+c（i）。

contents.text: On receipt, the process is reversed to yield the plaintext String.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收时，该过程被反转以生成纯文本字符串。

contents.text: Implementation Notes It is possible that the length of the key returned may be larger than needed for the encryption scheme in use. In this case, the RADIUS client is responsible for performing any necessary truncation.
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明返回的密钥长度可能大于使用中的加密方案所需的长度。在这种情况下，RADIUS客户端负责执行任何必要的截断。

contents.text: This attribute MAY be used to pass a key from an external (e.g., EAP [15]) server to the RADIUS server. In this case, it may be impossible for the external server to correctly encrypt the key, since the RADIUS shared secret might be unavailable. The external server SHOULD, however, return the attribute as defined above; the Salt field SHOULD be zero-filled and padding of the String field SHOULD be done. When the RADIUS server receives the attribute from the external server, it MUST correctly set the Salt field and encrypt the String field before transmitting it to the RADIUS client. If the channel used to communicate the MS-MPPE-Send-Key attribute is not secure from eavesdropping, the attribute MUST be cryptographically protected.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性可用于将密钥从外部（例如EAP[15]）服务器传递到RADIUS服务器。在这种情况下，外部服务器可能无法正确加密密钥，因为RADIUS共享密钥可能不可用。但是，外部服务器应该返回上面定义的属性；盐字段应为零填充，字符串字段应填充。当RADIUS服务器从外部服务器接收属性时，它必须正确设置Salt字段并加密字符串字段，然后再将其传输到RADIUS客户端。如果用于传输MS MPPE发送密钥属性的通道不安全，无法防止窃听，则必须对该属性进行加密保护。

contents.text: 2.4.3. MS-MPPE-Recv-Key
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4.3. MS MPPE Recv密钥

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-MPPE-Recv-Key Attribute contains a session key for use by the Microsoft Point-to-Point Encryption Protocol (MPPE). As the name implies, this key is intended for encrypting packets received by the NAS from the remote host. This Attribute is only included in Access-Accept packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE Recv Key属性包含Microsoft点对点加密协议（MPPE）使用的会话密钥。顾名思义，此密钥用于加密NAS从远程主机接收的数据包。此属性仅包含在Access Accept数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-MPPE-Recv-Key Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE Recv密钥属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 17 for MS-MPPE-Recv-Key.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE Recv密钥的供应商类型17。

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 4
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>4

contents.text: Salt The Salt field is two octets in length and is used to ensure the uniqueness of the keys used to encrypt each of the encrypted attributes occurring in a given Access-Accept packet. The most significant bit (leftmost) of the Salt field MUST be set (1). The contents of each Salt field in a given Access-Accept packet MUST be unique.
contents.zh-CHS: Salt Salt字段的长度为两个八位字节，用于确保用于加密给定访问接受数据包中每个加密属性的密钥的唯一性。必须设置盐场的最高有效位（最左侧）（1）。给定访问接受数据包中每个盐域的内容必须是唯一的。

contents.text: String The plaintext String field consists of three logical sub-fields: the Key-Length and Key sub-fields (both of which are required), and the optional Padding sub-field. The Key-Length sub-field is one octet in length and contains the length of the unencrypted Key sub-field. The Key sub-field contains the actual encryption key. If the combined length (in octets) of the unencrypted Key-Length and Key sub-fields is not an even multiple of 16, then the Padding sub-field MUST be present. If it is present, the length of the Padding sub-field is variable, between 1 and 15 octets. The String field MUST be encrypted as follows, prior to transmission:
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串纯文本字符串字段由三个逻辑子字段组成：键长度和键子字段（两者都是必需的），以及可选的填充子字段。密钥长度子字段的长度为一个八位字节，包含未加密密钥子字段的长度。密钥子字段包含实际的加密密钥。如果未加密密钥长度和密钥子字段的组合长度（以八位字节为单位）不是16的偶数倍，则必须存在填充子字段。如果存在，则填充子字段的长度是可变的，介于1到15个八位字节之间。在传输之前，必须按照以下方式对字符串字段进行加密：

contents.text: Construct a plaintext version of the String field by concatenating the Key-Length and Key sub-fields. If necessary, pad the resulting string until its length (in octets) is an even multiple of 16. It is recommended that zero octets (0x00) be used for padding. Call this plaintext P.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过连接键长度和键子字段来构造字符串字段的纯文本版本。如有必要，填充生成的字符串，直到其长度（以八位字节为单位）为16的偶数倍。建议将零个八位字节（0x00）用于填充。把这称为明文P。

contents.text: Call the shared secret S, the pseudo-random 128-bit Request Authenticator (from the corresponding Access-Request packet) R, and the contents of the Salt field A. Break P into 16 octet chunks p(1), p(2)...p(i), where i = len(P)/16. Call the ciphertext blocks c(1), c(2)...c(i) and the final ciphertext C. Intermediate values b(1), b(2)...c(i) are required. Encryption is performed in the following manner ('+' indicates concatenation):
contents.zh-CHS: 调用共享秘密S、伪随机128位请求验证器（来自相应的访问请求分组）R和盐域A的内容。将P分成16个八位组块P（1），P（2）…P（i），其中i＝len（P）/16。调用密文块c（1）、c（2）…c（i）和最终密文c。需要中间值b（1）、b（2）…c（i）。加密以以下方式执行（“+”表示串联）：

contents.text: The resulting encrypted String field will contain c(1)+c(2)+...+c(i).
contents.zh-CHS: 生成的加密字符串字段将包含c（1）+c（2）+…+c（i）。

contents.text: On receipt, the process is reversed to yield the plaintext String.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收时，该过程被反转以生成纯文本字符串。

contents.text: Implementation Notes It is possible that the length of the key returned may be larger than needed for the encryption scheme in use. In this case, the RADIUS client is responsible for performing any necessary truncation.
contents.zh-CHS: 实施说明返回的密钥长度可能大于使用中的加密方案所需的长度。在这种情况下，RADIUS客户端负责执行任何必要的截断。

contents.text: This attribute MAY be used to pass a key from an external (e.g., EAP [15]) server to the RADIUS server. In this case, it may be impossible for the external server to correctly encrypt the key, since the RADIUS shared secret might be unavailable. The external server SHOULD, however, return the attribute as defined above; the Salt field SHOULD be zero-filled and padding of the String field SHOULD be done. When the RADIUS server receives the attribute from the external server, it MUST correctly set the Salt field and encrypt the String field before transmitting it to the RADIUS client. If the channel used to communicate the MS-MPPE-Recv-Key attribute is not secure from eavesdropping, the attribute MUST be cryptographically protected.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性可用于将密钥从外部（例如EAP[15]）服务器传递到RADIUS服务器。在这种情况下，外部服务器可能无法正确加密密钥，因为RADIUS共享密钥可能不可用。但是，外部服务器应该返回上面定义的属性；盐字段应为零填充，字符串字段应填充。当RADIUS服务器从外部服务器接收属性时，它必须正确设置Salt字段并加密字符串字段，然后再将其传输到RADIUS客户端。如果用于传输MS MPPE Recv Key属性的通道不安全，无法防止窃听，则必须对该属性进行加密保护。

contents.text: 2.4.4. MS-MPPE-Encryption-Policy
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4.4. MS MPPE加密策略

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-MPPE-Encryption-Policy Attribute may be used to signify whether the use of encryption is allowed or required. If the Policy field is equal to 1 (Encryption-Allowed), any or none of the encryption types specified in the MS-MPPE-Encryption-Types Attribute MAY be used. If the Policy field is equal to 2 (Encryption-Required), any of the encryption types specified in the MS-MPPE-Encryption-Types Attribute MAY be used, but at least one MUST be used.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE Encryption Policy属性可用于表示是否允许或需要使用加密。如果策略字段等于1（允许加密），则可以使用MS MPPE Encryption types属性中指定的任何或任何加密类型。如果策略字段等于2（需要加密），则可以使用MS MPPE Encryption types属性中指定的任何加密类型，但必须至少使用一种。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-MPPE-Encryption-Policy Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE加密策略属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 7 for MS-MPPE-Encryption-Policy.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE加密策略的供应商类型7。

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Policy The Policy field is 4 octets in length. Defined values are:
contents.zh-CHS: 策略策略字段的长度为4个八位字节。定义值为：

contents.text: 1 Encryption-Allowed 2 Encryption-Required
contents.zh-CHS: 1允许加密2需要加密

contents.text: 2.4.5. MS-MPPE-Encryption-Types
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4.5. MS MPPE加密类型

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-MPPE-Encryption-Types Attribute is used to signify the types of encryption available for use with MPPE. It is a four octet integer that is interpreted as a string of bits.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE Encryption Types属性用于表示可用于MPPE的加密类型。它是一个四个八位整数，被解释为一个位串。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-MPPE-Encryption-Policy Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE加密策略属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 8 for MS-MPPE-Encryption-Types.
contents.zh-CHS: MS MPPE加密类型的供应商类型8。

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Policy The Types field is 4 octets in length. The following diagram illustrates the Types field.
contents.zh-CHS: 策略类型字段的长度为4个八位字节。下图说明了“类型”字段。

contents.text: If the L bit is set, RC4[5] encryption using a 40-bit key is allowed. If the S bit is set, RC4 encryption using a 128-bit key is allowed. If both the L and S bits are set, then either 40- or 128-bit keys may be used with the RC4 algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果设置了L位，则允许使用40位密钥进行RC4[5]加密。如果设置了S位，则允许使用128位密钥进行RC4加密。如果同时设置了L位和S位，则RC4算法可以使用40位或128位密钥。

contents.text: 2.5. Attributes for BAP Support
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5. BAP支持的属性

contents.text: This section describes a set of vendor-specific RADIUS attributes designed to support the dynamic control of bandwidth allocation in multilink PPP [11]. Attributes are defined that specify whether use of the PPP Bandwidth Allocation Protocol (BAP) [12] is allowed or required on incoming calls, the level of line capacity (expressed as a percentage) below which utilization must fall before a link is eligible to be dropped, and the length of time (in seconds) that a link must be under-utilized before it is dropped.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述了一组特定于供应商的RADIUS属性，旨在支持多链路PPP中带宽分配的动态控制[11]。定义的属性指定在传入呼叫上是否允许或需要使用PPP带宽分配协议（BAP）[12]、线路容量水平（以百分比表示），在链路符合丢弃条件之前，利用率必须低于该水平，以及时间长度（以秒为单位）链路必须在被丢弃之前未被充分利用。

contents.text: 2.5.1. MS-BAP-Usage
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5.1. MS BAP使用

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute describes whether the use of BAP is allowed, disallowed or required on new multilink calls. It MAY be used in Access-Accept packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性描述在新的多链路调用上是否允许、不允许或需要使用BAP。它可以用于访问和接受数据包。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-BAP-Usage Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS BAP使用属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 13 for MS-BAP-Usage.
contents.zh-CHS: MS BAP使用的供应商类型13。

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Value The Value field is four octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 值值字段是四个八位字节。

contents.text: 0 BAP usage not allowed 1 BAP usage allowed 2 BAP usage required
contents.zh-CHS: 不允许0 BAP使用1 BAP使用允许2 BAP使用必需

contents.text: 2.5.2. MS-Link-Utilization-Threshold
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5.2. MS链路利用率阈值

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This Attribute represents the percentage of available bandwidth utilization below which the link must fall before the link is eligible for termination. Permissible values for the MS-Link-Utilization-Threshold Attribute are in the range 1-100, inclusive. It is only used in Access-Accept packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性表示可用带宽利用率的百分比，在链路符合终止条件之前，链路必须低于该百分比。MS链路利用率阈值属性的允许值范围为1-100（包括1-100）。它仅用于访问和接受数据包。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Link-Utilization-Threshold Attribute format is shown below. The fields are transmitted from left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS链路利用率阈值属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 14 for MS-Link-Utilization-Threshold
contents.zh-CHS: MS链路利用率阈值的供应商类型14

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Value The Value field is four octets in length and represents the percentage of available bandwidth utilization below which the link must fall before the link is eligible for termination. Permissible values are in the range 1-100, inclusive.
contents.zh-CHS: 值值字段的长度为四个八位字节，表示可用带宽利用率的百分比，在链路符合终止条件之前，链路必须低于该百分比。允许值的范围为1-100（含1-100）。

contents.text: 2.5.3. MS-Link-Drop-Time-Limit
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5.3. MS链路中断时间限制

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Link-Drop-Time-Limit Attribute indicates the length of time (in seconds) that a link must be underutilized before it is dropped. It MAY only be included in Access-Accept packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Link Drop Time Limit属性表示链路在断开之前必须未充分利用的时间长度（以秒为单位）。它只能包含在访问-接受数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Link-Drop-Time-Limit Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS链路丢弃时间限制属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 15 for MS-Link-Drop-Time-Limit
contents.zh-CHS: MS链路中断时间限制的供应商类型15

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Value The Value field represents the number of seconds that a link must be underutilized (i.e., display bandwidth utilization below the threshold specified in the MS-Link-Utilization-Threshold Attribute) before the link is dropped.
contents.zh-CHS: 值值字段表示链路在断开之前必须未充分利用的秒数（即，显示带宽利用率低于MS链路利用率阈值属性中指定的阈值）。

contents.text: 2.6. Attributes for ARAP Support
contents.zh-CHS: 2.6. ARAP支持的属性

contents.text: This section describes a set of Attributes designed to support the Apple Remote Access Protocol (ARAP).
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述了一组用于支持Apple远程访问协议（ARAP）的属性。

contents.text: 2.6.1. MS-Old-ARAP-Password
contents.zh-CHS: 2.6.1. MS旧ARAP密码

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Old-ARAP-Password Attribute is used to transmit the old ARAP password during an ARAP password change operation. It MAY be included in Access-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS旧ARAP密码属性用于在ARAP密码更改操作期间传输旧ARAP密码。它可以包括在访问请求包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Old-ARAP-Password Attribute Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS旧ARAP密码属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 19 for MS-Old-ARAP-Password Attribute
contents.zh-CHS: MS旧ARAP密码属性的供应商类型19

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 3
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>3

contents.text: String The String field is one or more octets. It contains the old ARAP password DES-encrypted using itself as the key.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串字符串字段是一个或多个八位字节。它包含使用自身作为密钥加密的旧ARAP密码DES。

contents.text: 2.6.2. MS-New-ARAP-Password
contents.zh-CHS: 2.6.2. MS新的ARAP密码

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-New-ARAP-Password Attribute is used to transmit the new ARAP password during an ARAP password change operation. It MAY be included in Access-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS New ARAP Password属性用于在ARAP密码更改操作期间传输新的ARAP密码。它可以包括在访问请求包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-New-ARAP-Password Attribute Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS新ARAP密码属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 20 for MS-New-ARAP-Password Attribute
contents.zh-CHS: MS新ARAP密码属性的供应商类型20

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 3
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>3

contents.text: String The String field is one or more octets. It contains the new ARAP password DES-encrypted using the old ARAP password as the key.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串字符串字段是一个或多个八位字节。它包含使用旧ARAP密码作为密钥加密的新ARAP密码DES。

contents.text: 2.6.3. MS-ARAP-Password-Change-Reason
contents.zh-CHS: 2.6.3. MS ARAP密码更改原因

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-ARAP-Password-Change-Reason Attribute is used to indicate reason for a server-initiated password change. It MAY be included in Access-Challenge packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS ARAP密码更改原因属性用于指示服务器启动密码更改的原因。它可以包括在访问质询分组中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-ARAP-Password-Change-Reason Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS ARAP密码更改原因属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 21 for MS-ARAP-Password-Change-Reason
contents.zh-CHS: MS ARAP密码更改原因的供应商类型21

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Why The Why field is 4 octets in length. The following values are defined: Just-Change-Password 1 Expired-Password 2 Admin-Requires-Password-Change 3 Password-Too-Short 4
contents.zh-CHS: “为什么”字段的长度为4个八位字节。定义了以下值：只需更改密码1过期密码2管理员需要更改密码3密码太短4

contents.text: 2.6.4. MS-ARAP-Challenge
contents.zh-CHS: 2.6.4. 阿拉普女士挑战赛

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: This attribute is only present in an Access-Request packet containing a Framed-Protocol Attribute with the value 3 (ARAP).
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性仅存在于包含值为3（ARAP）的框架协议属性的访问请求数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-ARAP-Challenge Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS ARAP质询属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 33 for MS-ARAP-Challenge
contents.zh-CHS: MS ARAP挑战的供应商类型33

contents.text: Vendor-Length 10
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度10

contents.text: Value The Challenge Field is 8 octets in length. It contains the challenge (as two 4-octet quantities) sent by the NAS to the peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 值挑战字段的长度为8个八位字节。它包含NAS发送给对等方的质询（作为两个4八位字节数量）。

contents.text: 2.7. Miscellaneous Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7. 杂项属性

contents.text: This section describes attributes which do not fall into any particular category, but are used in the identification and operation of Microsoft remote access products.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍的属性不属于任何特定类别，但用于识别和操作Microsoft remote access产品。

contents.text: 2.7.1. MS-RAS-Vendor
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.1. MS RAS供应商

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-RAS-Vendor Attribute is used to indicate the manufacturer of the RADIUS client machine. It MAY be included in both Access-Request and Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS RAS供应商属性用于指示RADIUS客户端计算机的制造商。它可以包括在访问请求和记帐请求包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-RAS-Vendor Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS RAS供应商属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 9 for MS-RAS-Vendor
contents.zh-CHS: MS RAS供应商的供应商类型9

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Vendor-ID The Vendor-ID field is 4 octets in length. The high-order octet is 0 and the low-order 3 octets are the SMI Network Management Private Enterprise Code of the Vendor in network byte order, as defined in the Assigned Numbers RFC [13].
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商ID供应商ID字段的长度为4个八位字节。高阶八位字节为0，低阶三位字节为供应商的SMI网络管理私有企业代码，按网络字节顺序排列，如分配编号RFC[13]中所定义。

contents.text: 2.7.2. MS-RAS-Version
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.2. MS RAS版本

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-RAS-Version Attribute is used to indicate the version of the RADIUS client software. This attribute SHOULD be included in packets containing an MS-RAS-Vendor Attribute; it SHOULD NOT be
contents.zh-CHS: MS RAS版本属性用于指示RADIUS客户端软件的版本。该属性应包含在包含MS RAS供应商属性的数据包中；不应该这样

contents.text: sent in packets which do not contain an MS-RAS-Vendor Attribute. It MAY be included in both Access-Request and Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: 在不包含MS RAS供应商属性的数据包中发送。它可以包括在访问请求和记帐请求包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-RAS-Version Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS RAS版本属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 18 for MS-RAS-Version
contents.zh-CHS: MS RAS版本的供应商类型18

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 3
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>3

contents.text: String The String field is one or more octets. The actual format of the information is vendor specific, and a robust implementation SHOULD support the field as undistinguished octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串字符串字段是一个或多个八位字节。信息的实际格式是特定于供应商的，一个健壮的实现应该支持字段作为无差别的八位字节。

contents.text: 2.7.3. MS-Filter
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.3. MS过滤器

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Filter Attribute is used to transmit traffic filters. It MAY be included in both Access-Accept and Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Filter属性用于传输流量过滤器。它可以包含在访问接受和记帐请求数据包中。

contents.text: If multiple MS-Filter Attributes are contained within a packet, they MUST be in order and they MUST be consecutive attributes in the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果一个数据包中包含多个MS筛选器属性，则它们必须是有序的，并且必须是数据包中的连续属性。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Filter Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS过滤器属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 22 for MS-Filter Attribute
contents.zh-CHS: MS过滤器属性的供应商类型22

contents.text: Vendor-Length > 3
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度>3

contents.text: Filter The Filter field is one or more octets. It contains a sequence of undifferentiated octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 筛选器筛选器字段是一个或多个八位字节。它包含一系列未分化的八位组。

contents.text: If multiple MS-Filter Attributes occur in a single Access-Accept packet, the Filter field from each MUST be concatenated in the order received to form the actual filter.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在一个Access Accept数据包中出现多个MS筛选器属性，则每个属性的筛选器字段必须按接收顺序连接起来，以形成实际筛选器。

contents.text: 2.7.4. MS-Acct-Auth-Type
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.4. MS帐户验证类型

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Acct-Auth-Type Attribute is used to represent the method used to authenticate the dial-up user. It MAY be included in Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Acct Auth Type属性用于表示用于验证拨号用户的方法。它可能包含在记帐请求包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Acct-Auth-Type Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Acct Auth Type属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 23 for MS-Acct-Auth-Type
contents.zh-CHS: MS账户认证类型的供应商类型23

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Auth-Type The Auth-Type field is 4 octets in length. The following values are defined for this field:
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证类型身份验证类型字段的长度为4个八位字节。为该字段定义了以下值：

contents.text: PAP 1 CHAP 2 MS-CHAP-1 3 MS-CHAP-2 4 EAP 5
contents.zh-CHS: PAP 1第2章MS-CHAP-1 3 MS-CHAP-2 4 EAP 5

contents.text: 2.7.5. MS-Acct-EAP-Type
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.5. MS帐户EAP类型

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Acct-EAP-Type Attribute is used to represent the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) [15] type used to authenticate the dial-up user. It MAY be included in Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Acct EAP Type属性用于表示用于对拨号用户进行身份验证的可扩展身份验证协议（EAP）[15]类型。它可能包含在记帐请求包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Acct-EAP-Type Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Acct EAP Type属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 24 for MS-Acct-EAP-Type
contents.zh-CHS: MS账户EAP类型的供应商类型24

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: Auth-Type The EAP-Type field is 4 octets in length. The following values are currently defined for this field:
contents.zh-CHS: 认证类型EAP类型字段的长度为4个八位字节。当前为此字段定义了以下值：

contents.text: MD5 4 OTP 5 Generic Token Card 6 TLS 13
contents.zh-CHS: MD5 4 OTP 5通用令牌卡6 TLS 13

contents.text: 2.7.6. MS-Primary-DNS-Server
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.6. MS主DNS服务器

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Primary-DNS-Server Attribute is used to indicate the address of the primary Domain Name Server (DNS) [16, 17] server to be used by the PPP peer. It MAY be included in both Access-Accept and Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Primary DNS Server属性用于指示PPP对等方使用的主域名服务器（DNS）[16,17]服务器的地址。它可以包含在访问接受和记帐请求数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Primary-DNS-Server Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS主DNS服务器属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 28 for MS-Primary-DNS-Server
contents.zh-CHS: MS主DNS服务器的供应商类型28

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: IP-Address The IP-Address field is 4 octets in length. It contains the IP address of the primary DNS server.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址IP地址字段的长度为4个八位字节。它包含主DNS服务器的IP地址。

contents.text: 2.7.7. MS-Secondary-DNS-Server
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.7. MS辅助DNS服务器

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Secondary-DNS-Server Attribute is used to indicate the address of the secondary DNS server to be used by the PPP peer. It MAY be included in both Access-Accept and Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Secondary DNS Server属性用于指示PPP对等方要使用的Secondary DNS服务器的地址。它可以包含在访问接受和记帐请求数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Secondary-DNS-Server Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS次要DNS服务器属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 29 for MS-Secondary-DNS-Server
contents.zh-CHS: MS辅助DNS服务器的供应商类型29

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: IP-Address The IP-Address field is 4 octets in length. It contains the IP address of the secondary DNS server.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址IP地址字段的长度为4个八位字节。它包含辅助DNS服务器的IP地址。

contents.text: 2.7.8. MS-Primary-NBNS-Server
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.8. MS主NBNS服务器

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Primary-NBNS-Server Attribute is used to indicate the address of the primary NetBIOS Name Server (NBNS) [18] server to be used by the PPP peer. It MAY be included in both Access-Accept and Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Primary NBNS Server属性用于指示PPP对等方使用的主NetBIOS名称服务器（NBNS）[18]服务器的地址。它可以包含在访问接受和记帐请求数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Primary-MBNS-Server Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS主MBNS服务器属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 30 for MS-Primary-NBNS-Server
contents.zh-CHS: MS主NBNS服务器的供应商类型30

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: IP-Address The IP-Address field is 4 octets in length. It contains the IP address of the primary NBNS server.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址IP地址字段的长度为4个八位字节。它包含主NBNS服务器的IP地址。

contents.text: 2.7.9. MS-Secondary-NBNS-Server
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7.9. MS辅助NBNS服务器

contents.text: Description
contents.zh-CHS: 描述

contents.text: The MS-Secondary-NBNS-Server Attribute is used to indicate the address of the secondary DNS server to be used by the PPP peer. It MAY be included in both Access-Accept and Accounting-Request packets.
contents.zh-CHS: MS Secondary NBNS Server属性用于指示PPP对等方要使用的Secondary DNS服务器的地址。它可以包含在访问接受和记帐请求数据包中。

contents.text: A summary of the MS-Secondary-NBNS-Server Attribute format is given below. The fields are transmitted left to right.
contents.zh-CHS: MS次要NBNS服务器属性格式的摘要如下所示。字段从左向右传输。

contents.text: Vendor-Type 31 for MS-Secondary-NBNS-Server
contents.zh-CHS: MS次要NBNS服务器的供应商类型31

contents.text: Vendor-Length 6
contents.zh-CHS: 供应商长度6

contents.text: IP-Address The IP-Address field is 4 octets in length. It contains the IP address of the secondary NBNS server.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址IP地址字段的长度为4个八位字节。它包含辅助NBNS服务器的IP地址。

contents.text: 4. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 安全考虑

contents.text: MS-CHAP, like PPP CHAP, is susceptible to dictionary attacks. User passwords should be chosen with care, and be of sufficient length to deter easy guessing.
contents.zh-CHS: MS-CHAP与PPP CHAP一样，容易受到字典攻击。应谨慎选择用户密码，密码长度应足以防止容易猜测。

contents.text: Although the scheme used to protect the Keys field of the MS-CHAP-MPPE-Keys, MS-MPPE-Send-Key and MS-MPPE-Recv-Key Attributes is believed to be relatively secure on the wire, RADIUS proxies will decrypt and re-encrypt the field for forwarding. Therefore, these attributes SHOULD NOT be used on networks where untrusted RADIUS proxies reside.
contents.zh-CHS: 尽管用于保护MS CHAP MPPE密钥、MS MPPE Send Key和MS MPPE Recv Key属性的密钥字段的方案被认为在线路上相对安全，但RADIUS代理将解密并重新加密该字段以进行转发。因此，这些属性不应在不受信任的RADIUS代理驻留的网络上使用。
